pullRequest.title: Fix enum reflection test for jdk15+
pullRequest.bodyText:
Enum classes have a third synthetic method in jdk15+, $values().
Also fixed some mistakes in the enum test.
Fixes #9216
[ci skip]
Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com

commit.message:
Fix enum reflection test for jdk15+

Enum classes have a third synthetic method in jdk15+, `$values()`.
Also fixed some mistakes in the enum test.

Fixes #9216

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>
